data.name: Wanking Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Upcoming games from Ultimate Games S.A.

Checkout upcoming games from our Publisher - Ultimate Games S.A.:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1065740/Repo_Man


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1212000

Welcome to Gay Bay, a town in which you need to take the matter into your own hands




You play as Winston Gay, a man whose house was taken away by the corrupt government after being called out for wanking too loud by his neighbors. Now, Winston is on a mission to make everyone in the town pay a price for taking away his home.

Wanking Simulator is a mix of destruction & wanking - you are thrown into a town called Gay Bay consisting of a church (God bless), a number of houses and a few other places, such as high school, a garage, etc.
The main goal is to destroy as many things as possible, complete story & side missions and collect points by wanking to the chaos we caused.
You are free to go wherever you want and destroy anything you want.
Our protagonist is given unlockable superpowers, such as spells, magic cumshots etc.



A more serious list of features:

  • Explore a nice neighborhood full of things ready to be sent flying into space
  • Destroy things, throw people around, blow up cars (fun), or be a civilized man whose goal is to quietly wank (boring)
  • Unlockable abilities, such as an explosion spell, or spawning an aggresive Pony which will help you fight bad human beings
  • Drive your uncle's car, complete deliveries & race missions, or chase the clouds with an hot air balloon
  • Sandbox Mode - customize everything as you wish, gravity, the power of your mighty kick, etc.
  • Arena Mode - fight off as many waves of enemies as you can
  • Parkour Mode - jump around, avoid bullets and kick bad guys
  • Wankhan DLC - visit Wankhan and recapture the disease cure from bad humans
  • Challenges Mode - complete difficult missions on time, each one is different
  • Customize your character - change the color of the skin, clothing, etc.
  • Achievements & Global Leaderboard - upload your high scores and compete with other wankers
  • 5 days cycle - each day there are different events happening in Gay Bay
  • Try to cause as much property damage as you can and upload your total score to the Leaderboard

MATURE CONTENT

ALL IN-GAME CHARACTERS ARE OVER THE AGE OF 18.
The game contains elements that mimic sexual behavior, i.e. masturbation. NO GENDER ARE VISIBLE! The game only shows the movement itself, which is accompanied by the sound of masturbation. There is violence in the game - you can stun other characters, beat them and kick them.

data.short_description: The best wanking experience known to mankind, from the comfort of your home. Visit Gay Bay and deliver some delightful changes to the town's community.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 730
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Should exist for better experience
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 550 Ti / better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Should exist as well

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains elements that mimic sexual behavior, i.e. masturbation.

All characters in game are over 18 years old.

GENDER ORGANS ARE NOT VISIBLE! The game only shows the movement itself, which is accompanied by the sound of masturbation.

There is violence in the game - you can stun other characters, beat them and kick them.
